name: HexBat
description:
This is a 2 player turn-based strategy game. Think chess meets turn-based RPGs.

Each player's team is made up of one character from each of these positions:
-Forward (Tank) - Usually has high health and damage while also being the slowest character.
-Flex (DPS) - Is flexible with how each character plays but is usually the fastest character.
-Support (Healer) - Has support abilities that enable other characters.

Characters take turns depending on their speed and generate Action Points at the start of each of their turns.

Action Points (AP) are used for either Actions (Attacks / Healing) or Moving (1 AP per tile).
Any unspent Action Points are carried over to the character's next turn up to a maximum of 6 AP.

Hex Grids consist of up to a maximum of 25 tiles of Five different types:
-Spawn: Spawn point for a Character (turns into a grass tile during game).
-Grass: Basic tile with no direct effects.
-Mud: Costs an additional AP to traverse.
-Molten: Take 10 Damage at the end of Character's turn.
-Corrupt: Doubles all Damage Character receives.

You can create your own custom Hex Grids with the in-game editor.

Victory Condition:
First player to kill 2 characters of the Opponent's team.
